snippet: President Obama’s announcement of his plan to draw down American troops in Afghanistan over the next year puts new focus on the sustainability of aid programs there.
abstract: President Obama’s announcement of his plan to draw down American troops in Afghanistan over the next year puts new focus on the sustainability of aid programs there.

headline.main: As Troops Leave, an Uncertain Future for U.S. Aid in Afghanistan
